page.title: 17SERVICES
page.content: Services, Public and Private available include: Doctor's Surgery in private house twice weekly: Mobile Library visits fortnightly: Chiropodist visits elderly: Milkman delivers 3 days a week and Butcher likewise while Wet Fish available on two days. Village Shop & Post Office 250 yards inside next Grid area. Newspapers delivered morning & evening. Fish & Chip Shop opens weekends. Community Policeman based at Binbrook covers wide rural area by car _ crime rate very low and most common offence probably exceeding 30 m.p.h. speed limit through village. Post collections twice daily and delivery by van each morning. No public telephone but kiosk is 50 yards into next Grid area. 36 out of 49 households on telephone _ essential in this rural area. Ludford has street lighting.
